phliker.com.controller

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • phliker.com.controller.PhotoController

  • public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
    PhotoController class for controll UI and its actions Contains actions for buttons and display retrieved image
    Since:
    2018-02-22
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Saydullo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkButtonStatus(int page)
      This method checks page number and update title and button status If it's in left end disable prev Button, and vice-verse
      void displayAndCacheImage(int page)
      This method for displaying an Image and adding to the ImageList for cache purpose Takes page number and according page number retrieve Image from flickrServise Displays Image and adds to cacheServise 's ImageList
      void displayCachedImage(int page)
      This method for displaying cached Image Takes page number and retrieve from Image list in cacheService
      void jsonModelParser(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
      This method used fot taking JsonObject and parse to the object models It loads JsonObject to JSONArray and parse to the PHOTO objects And add to the list of Photo objects

      This method for next button action.
      void prevImage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

    • Method Detail

      • nextImage

        public void nextImage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method for next button action. It's adds page number to 1 And retrieve image according to the page number If Image is not in cache it loads from url, otherwise it gets from cache
        Parameters:
        event - Action event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • prevImage

        public void prevImage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method for prev button action. It's decreases page number to 1 And retrieve image according to the page number In this case image would be always cached, so loads from cacheList
        Parameters:
        event - Action event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • jsonModelParser

        public void jsonModelParser(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
        This method used fot taking JsonObject and parse to the object models It loads JsonObject to JSONArray and parse to the PHOTO objects And add to the list of Photo objects
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - jsonObject from Flickr API
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • displayAndCacheImage

        public void displayAndCacheImage(int page)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method for displaying an Image and adding to the ImageList for cache purpose Takes page number and according page number retrieve Image from flickrServise Displays Image and adds to cacheServise 's ImageList
        Parameters:
        page - Int value of page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • displayCachedImage

        public void displayCachedImage(int page)
        This method for displaying cached Image Takes page number and retrieve from Image list in cacheService
        Parameters:
        page - Int value of page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • checkButtonStatus

        public void checkButtonStatus(int page)
        This method checks page number and update title and button status If it's in left end disable prev Button, and vice-verse
        Parameters:
        page - int page number
